name: simlin
description: The web frontend and backend service for simlin

scripts.lint: yarn rust-lint && yarn workspaces run lint
scripts.start:firestore: (gcloud beta emulators firestore start --host-port=127.0.0.1:8092 &) && yarn workspace @system-dynamics/app run firebase emulators:start
scripts.build:gen-protobufs: protoc --plugin='protoc-gen-ts=node_modules/.bin/protoc-gen-ts' --js_out='import_style=commonjs_strict,binary:.' --ts_out=. $(find src -name '*.proto') && gsed -i 's/goog.object.extend(exports, proto);/goog.object.extend(exports, proto.project_io);/g' src/simlin-engine/src/project_io_pb.js && mv src/simlin-engine/src/*.[jt]s src/core/pb/ && yarn format
scripts.rebuild-stdlib: cargo build && for input in stdlib/*.stmx; do model="$(basename $input | cut -d '.' -f 1)"; target/debug/simlin convert --model-only "$input" --output src/simlin-engine/src/stdlib/"$model".pb; done
scripts.build: yarn patch && yarn workspaces run build
scripts.deploy: export NODE_ENV=production && yarn clean && yarn build && yarn workspace @system-dynamics/app deploy && gcloud app deploy ./.app.prod.yaml && yarn workspace @system-dynamics/app deploy-clean
